MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL53 postcode area of LLannor, Penrallt and surrounding area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:30AM to allow the water board to safely carry out repairs on a burst water main. This may affect the electrical supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 1PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:31AM on 28th November 2020.
